00013 #ifndef SEGMENT2_H
00014 #define SEGMENT2_H
00015 
00016 #include <gtl/gtl.hpp>
00017 #include <gtl/vec2.hpp>
00018 #include <gtl/curve2.hpp>
00019 
00020 namespace gtl
00021 {
00027         template<typename Type>
00028         class Segment2 : public Curve2<Type>
00029         {
00030         public:
00032                 Segment2()
00033                 {
00034                         Vec2<Type> pts[2];
00035 
00036                         pts[0].x() = (Type)0.0;
00037                         pts[0].y() = (Type)0.0;
00038                         pts[1].x() = (Type)1.0;
00039                         pts[1].y() = (Type)1.0;
00040 
00041                         m_initial_points[0] = pts[0];
00042                         m_initial_points[1] = pts[1];
00043 
00044                         Curve2<Type>::setPoints(pts, 2);
00045                 }
00046 
00048                 Segment2(Vec2<Type> &start_pt, Vec2<Type> &end_pt)
00049                 {
00050                         if (setPoints(start_pt, end_pt) < 0)
00051                                 Segment2();     // if setPoints fails, construct default line...
00052                 }
00053 
00055                 int setPoints(Vec2<Type> &start_pt, Vec2<Type> &end_pt)
00056                 {
00057                         Vec2<Type> pts[2];
00058 
00059                         pts[0] = start_pt;
00060                         pts[1] = end_pt;
00061 
00062                         if (Curve2<Type>::setPoints(pts, 2))
00063                         {
00064                                 m_initial_points[0] = pts[0];
00065                                 m_initial_points[1] = pts[1];
00066 
00067                                 return 0;
00068                         } else {
00069                                 return -1;      
00070                         }
00071                 }
00072 
00074                 Type getDistance(Vec2<Type> point)
00075                 {
00076                         Type y, m, x, b;        // variables of the line equation
00077                         Type distance;
00078 
00079                         y = m_initial_points[0].y();
00080                         x = m_initial_points[0].x();
00081                         getEquation(m_initial_points[0], m_initial_points[1], m, b);
00082 
00083                         distance = (Type)(fabs( ((double)m * (double)point.x()) - point.y() + b ) / (double) sqrt( SQR(m) + 1.0 ));
00084 
00085                         return distance;
00086                 }
00087 
00089                 static void getEquation(Vec2<Type> &pt1, Vec2<Type> &pt2, Type &m, Type &b)
00090                 {
00091                         m = (Type)((double)(pt1.y() - pt2.y()) / (double)(pt1.x() - pt2.x()));
00092                         b = pt1.y() - (m * pt1.x());
00093                 }
00094 
00096                 Type length()
00097                 {
00098                         return (m_initial_points[0] - m_initial_points[1]).length();
00099                 }
00100 
00101         protected:
00102                 Vec2<Type>      m_initial_points[2];    // the 2 initial points from which this line was declared
00103         };
00104 
00105         typedef Segment2<int>    Segment2i;
00106         typedef Segment2<float>  Segment2f;
00107         typedef Segment2<double> Segment2d;
00108 } // namespace gtl
00109 
00110 #endif
